subject: Reply Immediately
mailbody:
Dear Beneficiary

This is to inform you that our affilliate bank has approved a Visa atm card that has a total of $3,000,000,00 to be delivered to your address and you can use this Visa atm card to withdraw money in your country. Reply for more information.

Regards
Robert Matthew

subject: Reply Immediately
mailbody:
Dear Mr. Every,

Thank you for the response.  I am still waiting for further instructions on how to proceed with the Visa atm card payment.

Sincerely,

Jack
